name: Teriyaki Tuna Steaks
author: Reynolds Kitchens(R)
summary: Bake or grill a meal in a packet with this easy teriyaki tuna steak with pineapple, fresh ginger, and mixed veggies.
ingredients: 2 sheets (12x18-inches each) Reynolds Wrap® Non-Stick Foil
1 (8 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice, drained
1 cup frozen mixed vegetables for stir fry (any combination)
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F or grill to medium-high
Center one tuna steak on each sheet of Reynolds Wrap® Non-Stick Foil with non-stick (dull) side toward food; top with pineapple chunks
Combine teriyaki sauce, ginger and salt; spoon over tuna and pineapple
Double fold top and ends to seal packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside
Bake 16 to 18 minutes on a cookie sheet in oven
OR Grill 8 to 10 minutes in covered grill
